2. Then, iterate through the results of each grand slam tournament (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open) in each year. If a majority of the results show that the player goes out on the second round, then the claim would be TRUE.

4. Since there is no majority of the results showing that the player goes out on the second round in grand slam tournaments, the claim is FALSE.
